title: Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore: NPS Centennial
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     NPS Centennial            NPS Centennial       The National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016. As we lead up to the centennial, we invite you to participate in Find Your Park Experiences to learn, discover, be inspired, or simply have fun in national parks. Find Your Park Experiences offer unique opportunities to explore national parks both in person and online. Check out the experiences in this park or search all experiences to identify an opportunity that matches your interests. You can also share your national park story at FindYourPark.com. A Call to Action remains the foundation for our 2016 centennial preparations. It is the National Park Service's blueprint for the future, outlining the innovative work we want to accomplish. Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore is a big part of this effort. Take a look at what we're doing and get involved!   Experiences      Hike 50 or 100 Miles  2016 marks the centennial of the National Park Service and the 50th anniversary of Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore. We are kicking off the celebration by launching the Hike-A-Hundred or Hike-Fifty Challenge. Anyone who hikes 50 or 100 miles in the park during the calendar year of 2016 will be eligible for a special prize. Read more      Call to Action Projects    Learn more about the work we're doing to prepare for the future.
